main event: A large oblong/elliptical object was observed rotating in the sky over Jamaica Bay, Long Island.
interesting points: The object was approximately 25 feet in length, It was reported to be too big and too fast for conventional aircraft, The sighting was confirmed by several emergency response staff (ERS), The sighting lasted for about two minutes, The object was seen traveling in a westerly direction across Jamaica Bay towards NAS NYK and New York City.
witness description: Patrolman from a police patrol boat
